mapper.select: select * from course.takes natural join course.course where coursename like #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into course.takes(secID, semester, year, timeslotID, courseID, user_name, grade, gpa) values (#{secID},#{semester},#{year},#{timeSlotID},#{courseID},#{user_name},#{grade},#{gpa})
mapper.delete: delete from course.takes where courseID = #{courseID} and semester = #{semester} and secID = #{secID} and year = #{year} and timeslotID = #{timeSlotID}
